entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 04:02 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 04:02 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:02 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
